name: Goblin Dark-Dwellers
text:
Menace
When Goblin Dark-Dwellers enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

name: Goblin Deathraiders
text: Trample

editions.flavor: Every once in a while, when they aren't getting incinerated in lava, crushed under rock slides, or devoured by dragons, goblins experience moments of unmitigated glory in battle.

We're elite. You're not.

name: Goblin Festival
text: {2}: Goblin Festival deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, choose one of your opponents. That player gains control of Goblin Festival.

editions.flavor: "What are we celebratin' again?"

name: Goblin Firebug
text: When Goblin Firebug leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

editions.flavor: Most goblins leave behind a wake of destruction. A few goblins take one with them.

name: Goblin Fire Fiend
text:
Haste
Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able.
{R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Goblin Fireslinger
text: {T}: Goblin Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target player.

editions.flavor: A rock between your eyes hurts. A burning rock between your eyes ruins your whole day.
A rock between your eyes hurts. A burning rock between your eyes ruins your whole day.

name: Goblin Firestarter
text: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: Goblin Firestarter deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Goblin Flectomancer
text: Sacrifice Goblin Flectomancer: You may change the targets of target instant or sorcery spell.

editions.flavor: Rerouting magic through a goblin's brain is the surest way to throw it wildly off course.

name: Goblin Flotilla
text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
At the beginning of each combat, unless you pay {R}, whenever Goblin Flotilla blocks or becomes blocked by a creature this combat, that creature gains first strike until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Exceptionally poor sailors, Goblins usually arrived at their destination retching and in no condition to fight.

name: Goblin Freerunner
text:
Surge {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

editions.flavor: There are old goblins and ambitious goblins, but very few old, ambitious goblins.

name: Goblin Furrier
text: Prevent all damage that Goblin Furrier would deal to snow creatures.

editions.flavor: Clambering up and over the powdery slope, the goblin chanced upon a small furry thing. There they regarded each other: the goblin and his new pair of earmuffs.

name: Goblin Game
text: Each player hides at least one item, then all players reveal them simultaneously. Each player loses life equal to the number of items he or she revealed. The player who revealed the fewest items then loses half his or her life, rounded up. If two or more players are tied for fewest, each loses half his or her life, rounded up.

name: Goblin Gardener
text: When Goblin Gardener dies, destroy target land.

editions.flavor: "Grow food in dirt? Save time—eat dirt."
Years of attempts have brought the goblins no closer to growing a sausage tree.

name: Goblin Gaveleer
text:
Trample
Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

editions.flavor:
"When everything looks like a nail, you really need to get yourself a hammer."
—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

name: Goblin General
text: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.
Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

text:
Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.

text:
Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.

name: Goblin Grappler
text: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

editions.flavor: Daru soldiers learned it's better to have a clean death from a sharp blade than to tangle with a goblin's rusted chains.

name: Goblin Grenade
text:
As an additional cost to cast Goblin Grenade, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor:
"I don't suppose we could teach them to throw the cursed things?"

"According to accepted theory, the grenade held some kind of flammable mixture and was carried to its target by a hapless goblin."
—Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

editions.flavor: For once, Squee realized, he wasn't the dumb one.

text: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

editions.flavor: All bark, someone else's bite.

name: Goblin Lookout
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Goblin creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Throw rocks at 'em! Throw spears at 'em! Throw Furt at 'em!"

name: Goblin Lore
text: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.

editions.flavor:
"I done forgot more than you'll ever know, pipsqueak."
"Yeah—that's your problem."
"Now listen closely, my young gob. There are many ways to eat pimple bugs, but I say the best way is all smashed together between two slug chips."

name: Goblin Lyre
text: Sacrifice Goblin Lyre: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to target opponent equal to the number of creatures you control. If you lose the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to you equal to the number of creatures that opponent controls.

name: Goblin Machinist
text: {2}{R}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Goblin Machinist gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Goblin Marshal
text:

When Goblin Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

name: Goblin Masons
text: When Goblin Masons dies, destroy target Wall.

editions.flavor: "Goblins build with true zeal—and anything else within arm's reach."

name: Goblin Mime

name: Goblin Mountaineer
text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

editions.flavor: The only thing worse than a goblin is a goblin that knows his way around.
Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.
Goblin lairs sit high in Jund's mountains. This gives the goblins easy access to the sacrificial peaks above and lets them build up a head of steam before attacking prey down below.
Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.

Whenever Goblin Piledriver attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

name: Goblin Psychopath
text: Whenever Goblin Psychopath attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal combat damage this turn, it deals that damage to you instead.

editions.flavor: The destruction he causes is nothing next to the chaos in his mind.

name: Goblin Pyromancer
text:
When Goblin Pyromancer enters the battlefield, Goblin creatures get +3/+0 until end of turn.
At the beginning of the end step, destroy all Goblins.

editions.flavor: "The good news is, we figured out how the wand works. The bad news is, we figured out how the wand works."

text:
Other Goblin creatures you control attack each turn if able.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.
Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

name: Goblin Racketeer
text: Whenever Goblin Racketeer attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

editions.flavor: "It, uh, fell off a cart?"

name: Goblin Raider
text: Goblin Raider can't block.

editions.flavor: He was proud to wear the lizard skin around his waist, just for the fun of annoying the enemy.

—Goblin grunt

text: Create four 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

editions.flavor: You don't so much hire goblins as put ideas in their heads.

name: Goblin Razerunners
text:
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners.
At the beginning of your end step, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player.

editions.flavor: Finding themselves in a new and unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

name: Goblin Recruiter
text: When Goblin Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Goblin cards and reveal those cards. Shuffle your library, then put them on top of it in any order.

editions.flavor: "Next!"

name: Goblin Swine-Rider
text: Whenever Goblin Swine-Rider becomes blocked, it deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and each blocking creature.

editions.flavor:
"May you get the mount you deserve."
—Suq'Ata curse

name: Goblin Taskmaster
text:
{1}{R}: Target Goblin creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

editions.flavor: For some reason, goblin fighting school isn't as crowded on day two.

name: Goblin Test Pilot
text:
Flying
{T}: Goblin Test Pilot deals 2 damage to target creature or player chosen at random.

editions.flavor:
"All pilots and prototypes destroyed. Extensive collateral damage inflicted. Conclusion: flawless design."
—Manual of Melek

name: Goblin Tinkerer
text: {R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. That artifact deals damage equal to its converted mana cost to Goblin Tinkerer.

editions.flavor:
"Can they do that?"
—Imwita, Zhalfirin artificer, last words

"Can they do that?"
—Imwita, Zhalfirin artificer, last words

name: Goblin Trenches
text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens.

editions.flavor: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.

"Even if we dislodge them, I fear these lands will never again yield crops."
—Kimmick, vanguard knight
The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.

name: Goblin Tunneler
text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

editions.flavor:
"You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

"You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House
"The best way over the mountain is through."
"The best way over the mountain is through."

name: Goblin Turncoat
text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate Goblin Turncoat.

editions.flavor:
"Goblins won't betray their own kind for any price. They'll do it for a very specific price."
—Phage the Untouchable

name: Goblin Tutor
text:
Roll a six-sided die for Goblin Tutor. On a 1, Goblin Tutor has no effect. Otherwise, search your library for the indicated card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your library afterwards.
2 Any Goblin Tutor
3 Any enchantment
4 Any artifact
5 Any creature
6 Any sorcery, instant, or interrupt

name: Goblin Vandal
text: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Goblin War Buggy
text:
Haste
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

name: Goblin Warchief
text:
Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Goblin creatures you control have haste.

editions.flavor: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.
